statements: UPDATE transactions SET trade_amount = 10.5, trade_price = 200.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;

UPDATE transactions SET trade_amount = 10.25, trade_price = 1500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 3;

UPDATE exchange_fees SET fee_amount = 5.25, fee_type = 'Withdrawal' WHERE fee_id = 2003;

UPDATE cryptocurrency_exchanges SET country = 'Japan', exchange_name = 'BitFlyer' WHERE exchange_id = 56789;

UPDATE cryptocurrency_exchanges SET exchange_name = 'New Exchange', country = 'New Country' WHERE exchange_id = 2005;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = '21f7a65e-bdf9-4a53-b1fe-61857095b0e0';

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 2000.50, timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE exchanges SET location = 'New Location', country = 'New Country' WHERE exchange_id = 2003;
